original_text: She saith unto him, Yea, Lord: I believe that thou art the Christ, the Son of God, which should come into the world.
korean_text: 이르되 주여 그러하외다 주는 그리스도시요 세상에 오시는 하나님의 아들이신 줄 내가 믿나이다

sentences.original_text: She saith unto him, Yea, Lord:
I believe that thou art the Christ,
which should come into the world.
